page.title: 11HOOK NORTON _EDUCATION
page.content: In our block there are 2 primary schools. There is aStudy centre for the use ofschools in Oxfordshire, for Adult classes and for in_service training for teachers. There is a thriving Evening Centre at Hook Norton Primary School, also, with 23 morning, afternoon and evening classes being available this term. Some new classes this time are ModEnglish and American Novels, Creative Embroidery and Self help with Herbs. These classes attract people from a large radius. Most of the Secondary_aged pupils from the block go to the Comprehensive school at Chipping Norton, for which transport is provided. Some parents, however, choose to send their children to schools in Banbury, Bloxham and even Oxford. Some Primary_aged shildren also go to private schools outside the block
